replies.body:
That Tahm Kench change is actually stupid.

Now the only value he gets from Devour is

A. Eating an enemy for cc and damage

or

B. Eating an Ally to save them but instead, both of you die because you slow as hell and can't flash

Would be nice if you guys actually left Zed as a semi-competitive champion that had some uses, almost like you guys never want to see him played in pro play ever again even though he's one of the most fun champions to watch at a pro level with all of his skill cap and outplay potential. But bronze and silvers gotta complain. I know this is late but like LL Stylish said, stop with the drugs Riot.
So what happens to solo lane mage Soraka now? {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

Please strengthen Kalista 
just more 25 attack distance
{{champion:266}} Aatrox is strong enough, dont buff him any more
okay, no one's gonna use aatrox anymore. He'll disappear since this msi, only 2 games played at MSI so far. Cmon riot, are you even serious?

I think morg is OP not because she has a black shield thats annoying its the 2 second stun off the bat lvl 1 noone else has a 2 second stun off the bat that i know of. I get it items stop it but not lvl 1.

Veigar says Hello.
Sure most dont take his Stun lvl 1. but it is still a long ass stun.

and its AOE
I'd like to know when RIOT plans to make the option for separate sound output devices for game and voice comms available, or don't they know how to do that, either? It's basic functionality.
Tahm change is stupid...why bother even eating ally or going support now  GG
Ashe R hitbox fixed but not Jinx R or Lux R & Q?

Looks like nothing has changed with this game. Champs are constantly getting buffed or nerfed with no clear direction and then they end up reversing the changes because they aren’t as good anymore. Instead of just randomly changing things, why not ask the community what things really need to be changed regarding champions??

I know you guys are ellergic to listening to the community and just doing whatever you want such as removing the crystal scar from customs and not giving us urf mode as a permanent game mode despite thousands of people protesting but come on! This is just ridiculous. 

How about allowing us to edit settings for custom games such as gold income per second, walk speed, disable minions, disable parts of the map etc etc 
Playing on summoners rift is getting really boring and not been able to change anything that isn’t the practise tool just seems strange.
